CmdLine: curl https://bintray.com/sbt/rpm/rpm | tee /etc/yum.repos.d/bintray-sbt-rpm.repo  && yum -y install sbt which  && curl -L -O https://github.com/ncwuping/kafka-manager/raw/master/kafka-manager-${KAFKAMGR_VERSION}.tar.gz  && tar zxf kafka-manager-${KAFKAMGR_VERSION}.tar.gz --directory /usr/src  && rm -f kafka-manager-${KAFKAMGR_VERSION}.tar.gz  && cd /usr/src/kafka-manager-${KAFKAMGR_VERSION}  && JAVA_HOME=/opt/ibm/java  && ./sbt -java-home /opt/ibm/java clean dist  && cd -  && mv -f /usr/src/kafka-manager-${KAFKAMGR_VERSION}/target/universal/kafka-manager-${KAFKAMGR_VERSION}.zip ./  && rm -rf /root/{.ivy2,.sbt} /usr/src/kafka-manager-${KAFKAMGR_VERSION}
Commands.Name: run
